item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Niklas Baier
item.description:
This is my first post on this website! In the following days and weeks, more content will be posted here. I am planning on documenting my quant finance research & coding adventures via more detailed articles as well as smaller updates. Anyways, have fun reading what I have to say and leave me a comment …

Hello world! Read More »
item.content:encoded: This is my first post on this website! In the following days and weeks, more content will be posted here. I am planning on documenting my quant finance research & coding adventures via more detailed articles as well as smaller updates. Anyways, have fun reading what I have to say and leave me a comment Cheers, Niklas
